column5: Just got word from Keith and Deb at Bluffy that the ice is out for opener. Should be spectacular!!!! Weather looks good, but that usually does not effect the fishing anyway.

Opener was good. Not quite as warm as previous openers. Water temps in the 40's the whole week. Not the numbers we were used to , but the quality of walleye was better. Not disappointed at all. Our hosts at Bluffy Keith and Deb were awesome as usual.
